<JD_START>
Job Title: R&D Developer

Location: Boise Metropolitan Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Job Summary: The Product Developer role will be part of a dynamic and innovative R&D team that will deliver top product quality, value, functionality, and taste.
Job Duties:Develop new products and/or upgrade core products to meet consumer needs and business strategies.Create innovative new products to be presented to customers and increase presence with potential, new, and existing customers.Define quality standards such as sensory, product performance, food safety, and regulatory requirements.Research new ingredients and concepts so that they can be applied as product improvements, cost reductions, or innovations.Leverage collective expertise to suggest improvements to cost of goods, product design and manufacturing, sustainability, and ROI.Translate bench top designs to full-scale production products.Lead plant trials associated with new product launches.Lead product launch process to ensure new products are brought to market smoothly, completely, and in a timely manner.Collaborate with a cross-functional team comprised of sales, quality, regulatory, production, purchasing and marketing partners.Work with sales to provide technical service support to customers.Manage and prioritize customer projects with R&D Manager and sales.Maintain and organize concise records of all technical and business activities.Approach projects with a practical knowledge of HB Specialty Foods products, operational systems, food processing capabilities and impact of distribution chains.Perform other duties as assigned.
Personal Characteristics:Have a passion for food and learning!Excellent organizational skills with attention to detail.Excellent time management skills with a proven ability to meet deadlines.Detailed analytical abilities.Ability to work in cross functional teams. Experience:Bachelors or advanced degree in Food Science, Food Process Engineering, or related field required.Four to five years of product development and commercialization experience.Background in service industry a plus.
Physical Requirements:Must be able to work in a facility that handles allergens including but not limited to: wheat, soy, egg, milk, and tree nuts.Must be able to work in open environments exposed to pungent odors and varying climates. Benefits:Medical Insurance, *first day of the month immediately following hire date.Voluntary Dental and Vision Insurance.Flexible Time Off.Flexible Benefits Plan.Matching 401(k) Plan.BBQ’s and Picnics. HB’s Vision: To positively impact the lives of our families, partners, and communities for future generations by leading innovation in the food chain.HB’s Mission: To develop and deliver the best food solutions for people and planet. Values: The values by which HB Specialty Foods operates its business are based upon the Company’s own, unique “BLENDS” concept:COLLABORATIONQUALITYINTEGRITYAPPRECIATIONKINDNESSSAFETY

Experience Level (if available): None
<JD_END>
